participant_1.background:
I am generous with my family and friends.
i have two sons that i am raising by myself.
i take things very literally.
I moved to Los Angeles from Tokyo and my brothers helped me a lot, so I am making lunch for them to show my appreciation.
I joined a ski club and met a great group of friends.

participant_2.background:
I dance for an hour every day to Prince songs.
I remember buying a video game console so I can play with my son.
I started a bakery to help me cope with my mental health.
i am a military veteran.
I cherish my favorite pair of running shoes.

content.text: Great thanks! I'm a military veteran who started a bakery to help me cope with my mental health.

Wow, that's awesome! I'm glad you were able to find something to help you cope. I recently moved to Los Angeles from Tokyo and my brothers helped me a lot, so I am making lunch for them to show my appreciation.
That's so sweet of you! I'm sure they'll appreciate it. I love dancing for an hour every day to Prince songs. What are your hobbies?
I joined a ski club and met a great group of friends. I'm also pretty generous with my family and friends.
That's great! I'm glad you're able to enjoy your hobbies and have a good time with your friends and family.
Thanks! I'm pretty happy with my life right now. How about you?
I'm doing well! I'm excited to see what the future holds for my bakery.
I'm sure it will be great! You seem like a really hard worker.
